title: Primary Results, An Abortion Win in Kansas, and Pelosi’s Taiwan Trip
summary:
Kara is joined by co-host Lis Smith! They discuss this week’s primary results and Kansas voting to uphold the right to abortion. Also, Nancy Pelosi’s trip to Taiwan, and Twitter subpoenas Musk allies. And, though it is indeed Scott-Free August….some dick jokes.
You can find Lis’s book, “Any Given Tuesday,” here.
Send us your questions by calling us at 855-51-PIVOT, or via Yappa, at nymag.com/pivot.
